documents.document: There's no day like a snow day! ... I'll see myself out. https://t.co/soC2Uje5Zx
Wow, power supply kicked the bucket on me and tripped a breaker! Then again, 7 years of constant operation will do that to consumer PSUs.
@THEBENWA it's okay! Meet isn't going anywhere... Right?... right?
Also perforce means my work is stuck on a dead box :/
I'm looking forward to the supercuts of drivers spinning out or sliding backwards down hill to the tune of yackity sax.
How about that snow? https://t.co/TC7ryWa2iQ
On the plus side, the bike paths were totally empty today! :D 🌫🌫🚲
Player finds a genie during the quest, wishes to be a lich. Quest reward involved a good blessing that killed the player. #pathfinder
Okay America, you got us, very funny. When's your /actual/ election? America?
Turning off election coverage now. This would be funny were it not so very sad.
inb4 Hillary moves to Canada.
gg america #Election2016
Even if trump doesn't win, clearly something in America has been roused from its slumber, and will not be easily put down.
Well this sure going downhill. #Elections2016 #CouldHaveFeltTheBern
@avidcinephile Say hello to President Trump.
I like it when I make dumb twitter jokes, and then get almost immediately followed by a bot.
@THEBENWA @haxcb business tip, Literally hold your customers hostage.
@haxcb alternatively, make it arduous, ideally involving a labyrinth and a minotaur. You'll have great retention on your subs! :p
Well unless drenched raingear is lethal, you can put away the axes and swords and stuff.
First commute after dark for the year. If I don't make it, distribution of my things is to be decided by gladiatorial death matches.
So this sign went up by where I crashed. I think they captured me quite well. https://t.co/32Zkj6RFsR
"And I'll help the halflings with the omelette situation" #Pathfinder
And home! See you again soon Kelowna. Very soon! *sinister thunder*
@avidcinephile @THEBENWA don't lie, we sent infiltrators. We saw the sound proofing, the cramped conditions, the vicious guard cat!
@avidcinephile @THEBENWA that's still in the pen most of the time!
This week on Pathfinder: we fought and spared a kelp monster, and I became a pteranodon's mom.
1.5 hour rebuild followed by a crash on link. This is a very productive Friday so far.
My favourite part of the #crtc hearings is all the talk of how important access to fibre is to Canadians. #justNeedsOneTypo
Serious news is that I fractured my radial bone, which is gonna hurt, but heal fine if I keep it mobile. No cast, no drugs. This is good.
That bad news is I HAVE A SPOOKY SKELETON INSIDE ME #2spooky https://t.co/mFvCzPvC2f
So the good news is I'm okay. https://t.co/CH4tZbPnry
Making my way home, details to follow! Tldr I'll be fine
Bryan done broke a bone!
Xrayed, and still no needles get busted out. Things are going well. Waiting for results.
This is gonna be a looooong wait. /R/aww here I come!
All I can say is I'm super glad I went pee before I left this time. #Lessonslearned
Woo back at VGH! This time my own damned fault. Ate some pavement and landed funny. Tweet me your condensations!!
#Pathfinder Quote of the day "You go blow on the ropes, I'm busy kissing the statue"
Pathfinder quote of the day: You are awake and alive and covered in spiders.
Today was so hot, my inner tube expanded so much it pushed part of the tire out of the rim half an hour into my ride!!
Alright Pokemon Go-ers, what are your teams?
I'm a Skyboxer now! That's news.
We didn't start the fiiiiire, the alarm just decided to go off in the building.
Just picking up the bike for one last commute https://t.co/sC8nt86cMT
So Vancouver Dev friends, who's looking for a programmer?
Seriously though, it's been a slice Roadhouse. I wish you all the best with #LegacyoftheBeast and all your other endeavours.
Spot the difference! https://t.co/7EflbyG13O
Hope nobody wanted to be the official batter tester/choco QA. Not much left after all. https://t.co/xsH50skwkE
This bus ride has free soap opera previews audio courtesy of lady who forgot to bring headphones.
Due to spoilers I won't take a picture, but April did not go well
Month 4, the first beer spill incident. No casualties reported. More on this story as it develops. https://t.co/6LJiKTPmJI
Once more into the breech https://t.co/Xh4pxkWVWi
Hello Kelowna
It's coffee time (soon). I'm actually really stoked about these beans. https://t.co/nQrU58mFVG
Huh, baggage claims are 0-based. Neat. https://t.co/9ufeAG0oHO
Alright. Onboard Schrödinger's airplane. Or am I. Who knows anymore!!! D:
Now the plane has gone from late to here to late again. I'm officially amused. Good thing I have nothing planned for today.
And now the flight is on time? STOP TOYING WITH ME WESTJET! ( ╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻
Dat 40 min flight delay tho.
Farewell Kelowna, it has been a slice.
Happy new year everybody. We kicked off the new year by getting rekt at Pandemic. Good start, good start!
Merry christmas everybody!
@bryanegr I mean, you know you're a retirement town when that's your marketing line. I promise to deliver a picture of this on the way home.
I regret not taking a picture at the time, but the exit hallway at YLW is lined with these "Okanagan Bucket List" posters.
And now the exciting transition from waiting at the gate to waiting on the plane.
Getting to the airport early means less stress. Also means more being bored and trapped in an airport.
At roadhouse we're nothing if not multifaceted people. https://t.co/pR4F2Cjp7z
Jewish bagel place: your sweet reprieve from Christmas music in restaurants.
And hello rainy old Vancouver!
What possessed me to pick an early fight, I wonder in the darkness of this morn.
Bought some actual coffee roasting equipment this time with my order of beans. Is this a horrible waste of money? Maybe!
Fun facts, last night's fire alarm fiasco was caused by someone deciding to have a fog machine at their party on the roof... :/ wth people!!
Also of interest, half the building is down here, the other half is still in their units peering down at the commotion.
Apparently rooftop this time!
Once again into the street, once again someone turned dinner into an evacuation. https://t.co/Vdic25kuuQ
@haxcb @bryanegr lost in the depths of the DOM
@haxcb and she was never seen again.
Side note, once I finish wading through config files, and remember how to use vim, anyone interested in playing if I ran a minecraft server?
Why am I installing Arch Linux on my server? Why have I done this to myself?
Ah, bike cleaning day. Where you wonder how your bike still manages to function under all that accumulated grime.
@haxcb See! This is what a *real* programming language should be like! :D
@haxcb brainfuck is still my go-to esoteric language. Maybe LOLCode as a close second.
@haxcb Alternative title: "Read 'em and weep"
Basically: https://t.co/uvuaL9w9m2
Less Orange than I would have liked, but we did it Canada! #elxn42
@QETZL that's the spirit!
Also, back from post plebiscite retirement, is my tweaked mantra: "Vote! Or you're dead to me" #elxn42
@haxcb gotta love it when someone decides to force a link's target. Fuck end users, right?
And back in Vancouver!
Finally getting on the plane!
This is what my plane looks like! And, yup, tarmac boarding! http://t.co/bnLC2Pzlsj
Neato! Tarmac boarding today!
And with that, no more finding the wash-mangled remains of transit tickets in literally every pocket. http://t.co/Y4TDGMVZYI
Spending a Saturday evening listening to the Attack on Titan OST, and painting plastic space mans. Am I cool enough 4 u?
Low tide http://t.co/Ln45vX3ruy
@QETZL @sodabats if the rest of us can't be free, you can't either!
Nothing beats getting woken up by a screeching fire alarm
@haxcb is it you? I'll bet its you!
Good evening Vancouver. You're looking lovely. http://t.co/VlrjHGx2lU
Well my place may be a mess right now. But it is an air conditioned mess http://t.co/KJ6jOvdRCC
